review: Got this as a Christmas gift from hubby! Easy set-up and love the voice recognition on the remote. Lots of apps and free tv shows/movies to choose from. Can transfer it from one tv to another without worrying about cable outlets. However, it keeps getting disconnected and the screen would go blank periodically. Every time this happens, we would check the HDMI connections, and they all seemed secure. We'll try another HDMI cord to see if this resolves the problem. Otherwise, love it, and highly recommend! :)
